title: Patch 5.4 Changes

embed.description: A Riot Games developer was interviewed about the buffs and nerfs in the patch 5.4. This is what he had to say!

Jungling is rough right now. Hard to play, not as fun to play, less of an impact on the game.

All Riot needs to do to make jungle diversity happen is slowly revert all the changes they made to the jungle. Bring back the gp10 items. Bring back force of nature. Undo every little thing that's slowly been choking tank junglers out of the meta. All the big streamers (NightBlue3 OddOne) are saying this. Reddit is saying this. The boards are saying this. Makes sense for Riot to listen.

Jungling is rough for anyone besides about three champions.

Jungling is very hit or miss right now. Either you secure a few kills at low levels, or you fail trying, miss out on farm, fall super behind and can't do jack shit for the rest of the game.

Why not just buy trailblazer if you are a squishy jungler who needs to gank? Yeah chilling smite is nice, but hecarim and evelyn could gank before Chilling smite existed, they can gank just fine.

And trailblazer keeps their health and mana up so they can gank more.

Yeah though, you need to be ON TOP of your cooldowns and smites for your first clear or so. Especially as squishier junglers like Eve. If you slip up for 3 seconds against blue buff, you won't be able to clear red buff. Course I don't really think this is a problem.

Magical.

Why does everyone want Tanky junglers? They are garbage and boring. I like tanky top laners, but having a jungle full of immobile tanks who cannot do damage during ganks is just really stupid. 

Vi, J4, Fiddles, Xin, Rek'Sai, Wukong, Lee Sin, Sejuani-- these are what junglers should be like-- mobile, good clears, and tools for engagement.

Nautlius/Mundo/Nunu-- these are stupidly designed champs for jungling and are boring as hell to watch or play with-- Naut in particular is such a dumb champion.
play my main man zac and tell me your not having a fun time XD

I don't ever like to really get in on this Riot bashing, I really do think they are trying to make the game the best for everyone, that's where the money is at. With that said, this was the funniest damn LoL video I've ever seen. The editing was spot on and I teared up at work it was so damn funny.
